ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 3
ygData.msgSnippet: High elves and Wood elves are able to wear small/medium. Half-elves and humans can wear Medium only. We won t ever be able to wear a dwarven ringmail tunic.
ygData.messageBody:
High elves and Wood elves are able to wear
small/medium. Half-elves and humans can wear Medium
only. We won't ever be able to wear a dwarven ringmail
tunic. There may be a similar equivelant though for
medium.

Belgarth

--- EQ_Masters@onelist.com wrote:

> Message: 1
> Date: Tue, 4 May 1999 18:29:07 EDT
> From: Clanretri@...
> Subject: quest help / armor question
>
> Hail all!
>
> I have a question about the Paladin quest in
> Nfreeport. It's the one about
> the tokens of courage and generosity, anyone know
> where i can find those
> tokens he did not give any hints whatsoever:(
> Also the dwarven ringmail tunic, i understand
> that's it's for small races
> only? but I seen a couple of high-elves wearing
> them, so is it possible for
> human to wear it as well?
> Any help will be greatly appreciated, thanx!
>
>
> Bobaliya
